Japanese text: こうして、俺の高校生活三年間は幕を閉じた。
English text: Thus, my three years of high school came to an end.

Japanese text: 思えば、クラブにばかり出ていたような気がするなぁ。
English text: Thinking back, I feel like I spent most of my time at clubs.

Japanese text: なにはともあれ、無事卒業できて本当に良かった。
English text: Anyway, I'm really glad I was able to graduate safely.

Japanese text: とりあえず二流大学に合格もできたし、何も言うことはないな。
English text: I got accepted to a second-rate university, so I have no complaints.

Japanese text: そういえば、彩子は絵を本格的に勉強するため、パリに留学することになった。
English text: Speaking of which, Ayako is going to study painting seriously in Paris.

Japanese text: そういえば、彩子は絵を本格的に勉強するため、パリに留学することになった。しばらく会えなくて寂しいが、彼女の夢のためだ、いつまでも、待っていられる。
English text: She is going to study painting seriously in Paris. I'll miss her for a while, but it's for her dream, so I'll wait for as long as it takes.

Japanese text: フランス人は魅力的だから少し心配だけど、きっと、大丈夫だ。
English text: The French are charming, so I'm a little worried, but I'm sure it will be fine.

Japanese text: この学校の伝説が永遠に語り継がれるように、俺たち二人の愛も、永遠なのだから⋯。
English text: Just as the legend of this school will be passed down forever, so too will our love be eternal...

Japanese text: パリに留学することになった。しばらく会えなくて寂しいが、彼女の夢のためだ、いつまでも、待っていられる。
English text: She's going to study in Paris. I'll miss her for a while, but it's for her dream, so I'll always be waiting.

Japanese text: なにはともあれ、無事卒業できて本当に良かつた。
English text: At any rate, I am very happy that I was able to graduate safely.

Japanese text: そういえば、彩子は絵を本格的に勉強するため、パリに留学することになつた。
English text: By the way, Ayako is going to Paris to study painting in earnest.

Japanese text: パリに留学することになつた。しばらく会えなくて寂しいが、彼女の夢のためだ、いつまでも、待つていられる。
English text: She is going to study in Paris. I will miss her for a while, but I will always be waiting for her dream.

Japanese text: フランス人は魅力的だから少し心配だけど、きつと、大丈夫だ。
English text: I'm a little worried because the French are charming, but, tight, they'll be fine.

Japanese text: この学校の伝説が永遠に語り継がれるように、俺達二人の愛も、永遠なのだから⋯。

Japanese text: しばらく会えなくて寂しいが、彼女の夢のためだ、いつまでも、待つていられる。
English text: I'll miss her for a while, but it's her dream, forever, I can wait.

Japanese text: 幕を閉じた。
English text: The curtain closed.

Japanese text: 気がするなぁ。
English text: I have a feeling.

Japanese text: そういえば、彩子は絵を本格的に勉強するため、パリに留学することになつた。しばらく会えなくて寂しいが、彼女の夢のためだ、いつまでも、待つていられる。
English text: By the way, Ayako has decided to go to Paris to study painting in earnest. I will miss seeing her for a while, but it is for her dream, so I will always be waiting for her.

Japanese text: 思えば、本ばかり読んでいたような気がするなぁ。
English text: Thinking back, I feel like I've been reading books all the time.

Japanese text: ―流企業は残念ながら不合格だつたが、俺の余分な知識を利用して、知り会いのつてでマスコミ関係の仕事につこうと思う。
English text: -Unfortunately, I was not accepted by the top companies, but I will use my extra knowledge to get a job in the media industry through a friend of mine.

Japanese text: そういえば、夕子はフリーターとして、気ままに生きるらしい自由な時間が多くてちょつとうらやましいな。
English text: Come to think of it, I'm a little envious of Yuko, who seems to live a carefree life as a freelancer, with lots of free time on her hands.

Japanese text: 彼女は、明るくてかわいいけど、飽きつぽいから、ちょつと心配だ。
English text: She's bright and cute, but I'm a little worried because she seems to get bored.

Japanese text: だけど、いつまでも二人で歩んでいける。
English text: But we can walk together forever.

Japanese text: ―流大学は残念ながら不合格だつたが、自分の才能を伸ばすために専門学校に進むことにした。
English text: Unfortunately, he was not accepted to a top-notch university, but decided to go to a vocational school to develop his talents.

Japanese text: そういえば、望は実業団で水泳をすることになつた。練習で忙しそうだから会える機会も少ないかもしれない。
English text: By the way, Nozomu has decided to swim for a business group. He seems to be busy with training, so we may not have many chances to meet.

Japanese text: そういえば、望は実業団で水泳をすることになつた。練習で忙しそうだから会える機会も少ないかもしれない。しかし、心配はしていない。
English text: By the way, Nozomu has decided to swim for a business group. He seems to be busy with training, so we may not have many chances to see each other. But I am not worried.

Japanese text: 最近、彼女はかなり女の子らしくなつてきてけつこう、人の目をひくから、ちょつと心配だけど。
English text: I'm a little worried about her because she is becoming more girly these days and attracting people's attention.

English text: But I am not worried.

English text: We can walk together forever.
